column3: Will break the blind casting at https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/62fdf9b07087b80d2142799bdd2324f61483359d/src/script/standard.cpp#L244 (moves to validateaddress' DescribeAddressVisitor in #11403).

Hmm? I'm referring to the fact that CScriptNum will throw scriptnum_error here if vch1 is {0x80} (ie negative 0).
